sprykerComponent.name: jumbotron
sprykerComponent.readme:
Displays a banner with an image and a short description.

Code sample

{% include molecule('jumbotron') with {
    data: {
        imageUrl: 'imageUrl',
        bgColor: 'bgColor',
        textColor: 'textColor'
    }
} only %}

defines.name: data
defines.contract:
{
    imageUrl: null,
    bgColor: null,
    textColor: null,
    headline: 'global.spryker.shop' | trans,
    subHeadline: 'global.spryker.motto' | trans
}
